21: וְהָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יְחַיֶּה־ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall nourish</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[that] a man</n> עֶגְלַ֥ת <sup>5697 </sup> <n>cow</n> בָּקָ֖ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>a young</n> וּשְׁתֵּי־ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and two</n> צֹֽאן׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>sheep</n>
22: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מֵרֹ֛ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass for the abundance</n> עֲשׂ֥וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[that] they shall give</n> חָלָ֖ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>of milk</n> יֹאכַ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>he shall eat</n> חֶמְאָ֑ה <sup>2529 </sup> <n>butter</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> חֶמְאָ֤ה <sup>2529 </sup> <n>for butter</n> וּדְבַשׁ֙ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n> יֹאכֵ֔ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall every one eat</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everyone</n> הַנּוֹתָ֖ר <sup>3498 </sup> <n>that is left</n> בְּקֶ֥רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n>
23: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> מָק֗וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>[that] every place</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> שָּׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> אֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>shall be where there were a thousand</n> גֶּ֖פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>vines</n> בְּאֶ֣לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>at a thousand</n> כָּ֑סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>silverlings</n> לַשָּׁמִ֥יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>it shall [even] be for briers</n> וְלַשַּׁ֖יִת <sup>7898 </sup> <n>and thorns</n> יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n>
24: בַּחִצִּ֥ים <sup>2678 </sup> <n>arrow</n> וּבַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>and with bows</n> יָ֣בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall [men] come</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> שָׁמִ֥יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>shall become briers</n> וָשַׁ֖יִת <sup>7898 </sup> <n>and thorns</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thither because all the land</n>
25: וְכֹ֣ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> הֶהָרִ֗ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>And [on] all hills</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּמַּעְדֵּר֙ <sup>4576 </sup> <n>with the mattock</n> יֵעָ֣דֵר֔וּן <sup>5737 </sup> <n>that shall be digged</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you will not</n> תָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>there shall not come thither</n> שָׁ֔מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יִרְאַ֖ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>the fear</n> שָׁמִ֣יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>of briers</n> וָשָׁ֑יִת <sup>7898 </sup> <n>and thorns</n> וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לְמִשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>4916 </sup> <n>but it shall be for the sending forth</n> שׁ֔וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>of oxen</n> וּלְמִרְמַ֖ס <sup>4823 </sup> <n>and for the treading</n> שֶֽׂה׃ <sup>7716 </sup> <n>of lesser cattle</n> פ
